reference.title: eucadw-status
reference.shortdesc: Checks for a connection to the data warehouse and for available data stored in the data warehouse.

row.entry: Administrator password you configured in the data warehouse installation.

section.title: Examples
section.p: The following example shows a successful connection.
section.codeblock: eucadw-status -p mypassword Connected to database: localhost:8777/reporting as eucalyptus Data present from 2012-05-27 22:25:01 to 2012-09-24 22:58:01
section.p: The following example shows an unsuccessful connection.
section.codeblock: eucadw-status -p mypassword Database access failed with the following details. SQLState : 3D000 Error Code: 0 FATAL: database "blah" does not exist
